code: export var SET_VALUE='SET_VALUE';export var SELECT_CELL='SELECT_CELL';export var SOLVE_PUZZLE='SOLVE_PUZZLE';export var RANDOMIZE_BOARD='RANDOMIZE_BOARD';export var CLEAR_PUZZLES='CLEAR_PUZZLES';export function setValue(x,y,value){return{type:SET_VALUE,payload:{x:x,y:y,value:value}};}export function selectCell(x,y){return{type:SELECT_CELL,payload:{x:x,y:y}};}export function solvePuzzle(){return{type:SOLVE_PUZZLE};}export function randomizeBoard(){return{type:RANDOMIZE_BOARD};}export function clearPuzzles(){return{type:CLEAR_PUZZLES};}
